description:
# Remapping keyboard keys

## KeyTweak (this package)
![](https://ia600201.us.archive.org/1/items/tucows_327616_KeyTweak/keytweak_ss.gif)

This utility allows users to redefine their keyboard input signals.

You can enable and disable keys, remap keys and reset all remappings with one click.

## [other/alternative] choco package called [PowerToys](https://chocolatey.org/packages/powertoys)
Alternatively one can use PowerToys to achieve the same:

![](https://www.howtogeek.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/xkeyboard_manager.png.pagespeed.gp+jp+jw+pj+ws+js+rj+rp+rw+ri+cp+md.ic.AJnKCL08_j.png)
![](https://www.howtogeek.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/xclick_plus.png.pagespeed.gp+jp+jw+pj+ws+js+rj+rp+rw+ri+cp+md.ic.QK8Cz5wLFz.png)
![](https://www.howtogeek.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/xremapping_keyboard.png.pagespeed.gp+jp+jw+pj+ws+js+rj+rp+rw+ri+cp+md.ic.Npg2Q6xN3w.png)

* HowToGeek [full guide](https://www.howtogeek.com/675871/how-to-make-your-scroll-lock-key-useful-on-a-windows-10-pc/)
author: Travis Krumsick
